translation: Puhttụ̄ abvlhabnụ̄ aathh byyhi gvv namurad suh. (yih avs ḥẓvr ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn pytr th abvlhb nav avs mshhvr th aslamch vath rukavnh khạṭr yvutah zvr tmụ̄ lgvv tath mnz gvv suh nakam th namurad. Aath jmls andr agrchhi pth spdan vajnhi kthhi hnz pyshn gvyy krnh āmcz chhe mgr yih chhe tithh pạtthụ̄ byan krnh āmcz zi zanth so spzmcz chhe)
Tmụ̄ sund mal th yikynczhah tmụ̄ kmvv suh āv nh tas kunhi bkar.
Ẓrvr yiyhi suh nar aalavas mnz travnh.
Byyhi (ts sintụ̄) tmụ̄ snz gr vajynụ̄ thi, yosh hr divan ạs, (amis zanhi avs nav aum jmyl. Yih ạs abvsfyans bynhi, th aslam dshmny mnz ạs pnnis khandars brabr jvr).
Tmụ̄ snz grdnhi mnz āshi mvnjhhi (akhi qsmuk gash) raz.
